settings.text: Introducing our extraordinary customized service for kids furniture! We believe that children's furniture should be as unique and special as the children themselves. With our customization options, you can create personalized furniture that perfectly matches your child's taste, style, and needs.

settings.heading: Add a touch of you to your tulip

settings.text:
We believe in the power of personalizing your living space.

We're excited to present our exclusive personalization service for our Tulip and armchair collection. Now, you can elevate your furniture by adding a custom leather name tag delicately embroidered at the heart of your Tulip sofa or armchair. Make your space uniquely yours with BIMBO CASA.

custom_css: .button {font-size: 10px; text-decoration: underline; text-underline-offset: 8px; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center;}
h1 {font-size: 24px; text-transform: uppercase; text-align: center; padding-bottom: 40px;}
.rich-text--text-center {vertical-align: middle; display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;}

settings.title: Step 1
settings.body:
Explore

_________

Explore our beautiful Tulip collection, featuring exquisite pieces ranging from snug sofas to striking statement armchairs. Your distinctive taste is set to bring it to a level of excellence.

settings.title: Step 2
settings.body:
Embrace

_________

Choose from our leather name tags that will bring a refined balance of sophistication. Personalize your chosen piece by selecting initials or a name with personal significance. You can even customize the stitch color to align with your unique style.

settings.title: Step 3
settings.body:
Personalize

_________

Choose from diverse fabric colors to seamlessly blend your furniture with your living space. Additionally, select a stitching color that aligns perfectly with your vision.

settings.text: Please select your preferred style from our Tulip collection to initiate the personalization process. Once you've chosen, proceed to the checkout and finalize your order.

custom_css: h1 {font-size: 24px; text-transform: uppercase; text-align: center; padding-bottom: 40px;}
.rich-text--text-center {vertical-align: middle; display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;}

settings.title: Streamlining
settings.body:
Lead time

_________

Our personalization service requires a one-month lead time from the order placement date.

settings.title: Manageable
settings.body:
Delivery estimate

_________

Following the customization period, your tailored piece will be dispatched promptly. You can expect to receive it within the specified delivery window.

settings.title: quick & easy
settings.body:
Updates and tracking

_________

Throughout the process, you will receive regular updates on the status of your order. A tracking number will be provided once your masterpiece is en route.Should you have any specific requests or inquiries, please don't hesitate to contact our dedicated support team.

settings.text:
As the birthday of your little one approaches, or perhaps another cherished event is on the horizon, imagine the delight of presenting a gift that radiates thoughtfulness and care. Our personalization service isn't just a touch of individuality; it reflects your unique essence. Be it a milestone birthday or any other extraordinary celebration, a bespoke Tulip piece is a treasure that captures the essence of the moment, transcending time itself.

Prepare to witness the joy and astonishment of gifting something truly exceptional.

.rich-text--text-center {vertical-align: middle; display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;}

settings.title: Our promise
settings.body:
Enhance your space, make it yours

_________

At BIMBO CASA, we believe that a home should reflect the personality of its inhabitants. With our personalized Tulip collection, you're not just buying furniture but investing in an experience.

-Explore the possibilities.

-Embrace the extraordinary.

-Personalize your Tulip piece today.

settings.title: Easy
settings.body:
Ordering process

_________

Ordering your personalized Tulip piece is as enjoyable as it is straightforward. Our user-friendly platform ensures an experience that allows you to focus on bringing your vision to life.

settings.text: Fill in the form to let it happen.

custom_css: form {display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center; width: 100%;}
